title: Ambient Cinematic Background Music Pack
description: 15 cinematic emotional background ambient tracks, ready to use in a number of situations.
longDescription:
15 cinematic emotional background ambient tracks, ready to use in a number of situations, including but not limited to:


- Egyptian atmosphere

- Medieval atmosphere

- Cuban atmosphere

- Christmas atmosphere

- and much more!

technicalDetails:
Number of files: 45 .wav files (There are 15 distinct tracks, precisely split into usable sections)

Sample rate: 48kHz

Bit depth: 24-bit

Total length: 48min 37sec

Loopable: Yes


Additional small features can be asked of me, for example loop a certain part, etc.

Additional information: Have fun using them!
